mapper.update: update index_log set INDEX_SUFFIX = #{indexSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_IMPORT_DATE = #{startImportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_IMPORT_DATE = #{endImportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_IMPORT = #{statusImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMAKE = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INDEX_ID = #{indexId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select INDEX_ID, INDEX_SUFFIX, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, START_IMPORT_DATE, END_IMPORT_DATE, STATUS_IMPORT, REMAKE from index_log where INDEX_ID = #{indexId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select INDEX_ID, INDEX_SUFFIX, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, START_IMPORT_DATE, END_IMPORT_DATE, STATUS_IMPORT, REMAKE from index_log
